casebody.data:
Berta BRADLEY, Appellant, v. ATLANTIC COAST LINE RAILROAD COMPANY, Appellee. No. 11648. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Oct. 30, 1946. Erie M. Donalson, of Bainbridge, Ga., for appellant. M. B. Peacock and H. H. Perry, Jr., both of Albany, Ga., for appellee.

Before HOLMES, WALLER, and LEE. Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the Court below is affirmed.
